AirBnB

As a frequent traveler, I am a big fan of the "real" AirBnb and had a lot of fun creating a replica of it. It includes the Google Maps API to show the locations of the homes as pins on a map. This is a full MERN stack application that uses no front end frameworks, just pure CSS.
